answers.answer: Meeee!!  I have been physically and mentally exhausted this whole pregnancy and I will be 32 weeks tomorrow.  :-(  I can barely function!! And to top it off I don't sleep at all at night, and I have pain in my hips and back. I had my first 14yrs ago!!  So it is WAY different!! Its so much more difficult for me this go around than last.  So you are NOT the only one!!

Same here. I'm 37 weeks now with my second baby and I was 27 when I was pregnant with my first . I had preeclampsia with my first and don't think I was this tired. I think it's age, sorry had to say it.

I'm always tired. It's raining here now which always makes me sleepover. I don't have any advice for that.But, with my second I had terrible pain in my hips when I slept. This is just starting for me with baby 3 and I have found relief. I took my body pillow, folded it in half and put it between my legs. No just my knees. I sleep with that sucker from groin down and have been sleeping comfortably for a week now.

question: I'm 37 and 31wks pregnant with my second child. I was 26 when I had my son and I don't recall having issues like with this one. I'm constantly tired but it's not physically it's mentally and emotionally. I don't want to rush my baby arrival, but I'm so ready for this to be over. Anyone else having that feeling?
title: exhausted
